title: Panel For Turban, 20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: warp faced plain weave patterned by warp stripes
Note: 1 inch from each end, 2 strand "countered" weft-twining in red and black  (MS'69)
provenance:
Purchased by donor in Nigeria.
Provenance supplied by donor.
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 240 x 50.5 cm (7 ft. 10 1/2 in. x 19 7/8 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mrs Calvin W. Stillman
description: Three broad stripes in black, two shades of tan, ivory and black on ivory ground.
